author: rhuijben
msg: * subversion/svnlook/main.c
(print_tree): Following up on r37416, use svn_uri_*() for repository paths
and print repository root as "/" instead of "".

author: rhuijben
msg: * build/generator/gen_base.py
(IncludeDependencyInfo:__init__): Make an exception to the rule of not
including private headers from public headers for private/svn_debug.h.

author: gstein
msg: write_entry() was incorrectly constructing not-present rows in the
BASE_NODE table. We added this code a while back, but it turns out that it
was trying to compensate for incorrect values on ENTRY->DELETED. In
r37414, we fixed the construction of the DELETED value, so this code is
incorrect and obsolete.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/entries.c:
(write_entry): remove insertion of not-present rows for certain
schedule-add conditions. the DELETED handling takes care of it for us.
(svn_wc__entry_remove, svn_wc__entry_modify, svn_wc__tweak_entry): add
calls to svn_error_return() on function exit to support tracing.

author: stsp
msg: Follow-up to r37417:
* www/hacking.html
(configury): Fix typo.
Found-by: hwright

author: stsp
msg: * www/hacking.html
(configury): Establish a rule about changes that break the build system
for other developers. This is not cast in stone yet. So far only
maxb, gstein. rhuijben and myself have given this consideration.
If you don't like it, please let us know.
